data.comment: In the minute -1, A total of 1700 spectators is reported.
Spartak Moscow kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
Aleksey Sutormin (Saint Petersburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Malcom of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sergey Karasev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 7, Spartak Moscow needs to be cautious. Saint Petersburg have an attacking throw-in.
Malcom (Saint Petersburg) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, Goal! Sardar Azmoun gives Saint Petersburg a 1-0 lead.
Wendel instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 11, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Saint Petersburg.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 17, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Sardar Azmoun of Saint Petersburg is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 19, Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 22, Own goal in Saint Petersburg! Dejan Lovren scores in his own net to make it 1-1.
Can Saint Petersburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Roman Zobnin (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Artem Dzyuba (Saint Petersburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Magomed Ozdoev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sergey Karasev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 33, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 35, Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Malcom's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jordan Larsson (Spartak Moscow) gets booked by Sergey Karasev, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba has run offside.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 38, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Saint Petersburg, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
In the minute 39, Saint Petersburg drives forward and Sardar Azmoun gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Malcom (Saint Petersburg) gets a yellow card.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Saint Petersburg are on the attack at Gazprom Arena, where Malcom is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 42, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Samuel Gigot.
Spartak Moscow’s Samuel Gigot is on his feet again at Gazprom Arena.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Sergey Karasev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
The first-half is over at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 46, Saint Petersburg kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Ayrton Lucas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 48, Spartak Moscow's Ayrton Lucas misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Petersburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba is on target but unsuccessful.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 54, At Gazprom Arena, Georgi Dzhikiya has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 59, Saint Petersburg drive upfield and Malcom gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
Saint Petersburg's Aleksey Sutormin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spartak Moscow defender.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 62, Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 63, Jordan Larsson for Spartak Moscow is whistled offside.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 65, Saint Petersburg push forward at Gazprom Arena and Artem Dzyuba gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Spartak Moscow defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Douglas Santos for Saint Petersburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 67, Saint Petersburg's Douglas Santos is back in action after a slight knock.
The home team has substituted Douglas Santos with Yuri Zhirkov. Sergey Semak is thus making his first change.
Domenico Tedesco is making the team's first substitution at Gazprom Arena with Ilya Kutepov replacing Zelimkhan Bakaev.
In the minute 70, In Saint Petersburg, Artem Dzyuba of Saint Petersburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Saint Petersburg are coming forward and Wendel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 71, In Saint Petersburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Saint Petersburg, Ilya Kutepov (Spartak Moscow) misses the target with a header.
Sergey Karasev awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Yaroslav Rakitskiy scores to make it 2-1 at Gazprom Arena.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 75, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Saint Petersburg pushes forward through Wendel, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 77, Malcom of Saint Petersburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Wendel for Saint Petersburg has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
In the minute 80, Sardar Azmoun is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The home team have replaced Wendel with Daler Kuzyaev. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) is making a third substitution, with Sebastian Driussi replacing Malcom.
In the minute 82, Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba is whistled for offside at Gazprom Arena.
Saint Petersburg drive forward but Sardar Azmoun is judged offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Wilmar Barrios (Saint Petersburg) has received a first yellow card.
Ezequiel Ponce is back on the pitch.
In the minute 84, Ezequiel Ponce of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Attention is being given to Spartak Moscow’s Ezequiel Ponce and play has been suspended briefly.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Saint Petersburg push upfield and Artem Dzyuba gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Spartak Moscow defence.
In the minute 86, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Yuri Zhirkov (Saint Petersburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Ilya Gaponov is replacing Georgi Dzhikiya for Spartak Moscow at Gazprom Arena.
Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) has taken off Sardar Azmoun who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Aleksandr Yerokhin is the replacement.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Daler Kuzyaev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Sergey Karasev signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Saint Petersburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
Great finish from Artem Dzyuba to give Saint Petersburg a 3-1 lead.
